name: PreactPrototype
description: A simple preact based prototype for drtodolittle.

scripts.build_dev: webpack -d & copy src\index.html dist\index.html & copy src\default.css dist\default.css
scripts.dev: webpack -d & copy src\index.html dist\index.html & copy src\default.css dist\default.css & webpack-dev-server --content-base src --inline --hot
scripts.build_prod: webpack -p & copy src\index.html dist\index.html & copy src\default.css dist\default.css
